abstract: Halliburton has agreed to buy oilfield services company Boots & Coots for $3 per share, or $240.4 million, in cash and stock, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Halliburton has agreed to buy oilfield services company Boots & Coots for $3 per share, or $240.4 million, in cash and stock, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: Halliburton has agreed to buy the oilfield services company Boots & Coots for $240.4 million, or $3 a share, in cash and stock, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Halliburton Strikes Deal for Boots & Coots
